Module optionsCommand
Package fr.project.optionsCommand

Class Option

java.lang.Object
fr.project.optionsCommand.Option
public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
A class that describes all the options given into the run command. This class is used when you run the project Retro. It can contains the options: [--help], [--info], [--target] or [--features].
Author:
SIMONNOT Florent
